about_the_game:
Welcome to RealLife - Ultimate RolePlay à la Française

Explore an authentic virtual life in RealLife, the captivating role-playing game that evolves through interactions, choices and professions. Immerse yourself in a unique French-style gaming experience, where every action has significant repercussions and professions are interdependent to create a dynamic ecosystem.

key Features :


RolePlay à la Française: RealLife captures the essence of everyday life in France, with dialogues, interactions and scenarios designed to reflect cultural authenticity.

Interdependent Trades: Immerse yourself in a realistic economic system where trades depend on each other. Choose from a variety of professions, whether you're a farmer supplying raw materials to craftsmen, an influential merchant or a policeman keeping order in the city.

Dynamic social life: Experience a vibrant social life with realistic interactions between players. Form alliances with other professionals, collaborate on joint projects or compete for supremacy in your field.

Realistic Economy System: The choices you make in your profession directly influence the game's economy. Become an industry tycoon, a respected artist or a successful entrepreneur - the path you take shapes the world around you.

Career Development: Evolve in your profession by gaining experience, unlocking new skills and accessing unique opportunities. From ambitious novice to respected veteran, your career path depends on your determination.

Dynamic Trade Events: Take part in special events related to your profession, from trade shows to professional competitions. Outstanding achievements can bring you fame, recognition and new opportunities.

In-depth Personalization: Customize your character with an impressive level of detail. Whether you choose an urban or rural lifestyle, every detail counts in building your virtual identity.

Immerse yourself in RealLife today and discover a world where your choices influence the very fabric of society. Live the life you've always wanted to lead, and become the master of your destiny in this realistic French-style role-playing game.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-9600KF CPU @ 3.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum configuration subject to change.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i5-10300H CPU @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3050
